fact.description: The match is underway at Arena Amazonia.
Ball goes out of play for a Croatia goal kick.
Cameroon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Croatia will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Cameroon.
Corner awarded to Cameroon.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Croatia in their own half.
Pedro Proenca signals a Croatia throw-in in Cameroon's half.
Croatia to take a throw-in in Cameroon territory.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Cameroon just outside Croatia's area.
Cameroon have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Cameroon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Croatia's half?
Throw-in Croatia.
Pedro Proenca awards Cameroon a goal kick.
Can Cameroon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Croatia's half?

Ball safe as Cameroon is awarded a throw-in in their half.

That's a fine assist from Ivan Perisic.
Pedro Proenca signals a Croatia throw-in in Cameroon's half.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Croatia.
Croatia to take a throw-in in Cameroon territory.
In Manaus Croatia attack through Mario Mandzukic. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Cameroon at Arena Amazonia.
Croatia have been awarded a corner by Pedro Proenca.
Cameroon needs to be cautious. Croatia have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Croatia.
Ivan Rakitic gets his shot on target but fails to score for Croatia.
Croatia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Manaus, Alex Song of Cameroon is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Play is underway once more.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Luka Modric.
Cameroon's Stephane M'Bia breaks free at Arena Amazonia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Croatia at Arena Amazonia.
Luka Modric has recovered and rejoins the match in Manaus.
Can Cameroon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Croatia's half?

Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Croatia in their own half.
Throw-in for Croatia in their own half.
Croatia drive forward but Danijel Pranjic is judged offside.
Ivica Olic for Croatia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Cameroon have a goal kick.
Cameroon to take a throw-in in Croatia territory.
Free kick Croatia.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Manaus to check on Darijo Srna, who is grimacing with pain.
Play has been resumed.
Darijo Srna returns to the field for Croatia after picking up a slight injury.
Pedro Proenca signals a free kick to Croatia.

Pedro Proenca awards Cameroon a goal kick.
Pedro Proenca signals a Croatia throw-in in Cameroon's half.
Croatia have a goal kick.
Sammir of Croatia smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.

Alex Song has been sent off for Cameroon.
Pedro Proenca awards Cameroon a goal kick.

Cameroon are pushing forward but Vincent Aboubakar's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Croatia at Arena Amazonia.
The first half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.

The first-half has ended.
Croatia to take a throw-in in Cameroon territory.

Cameroon make their first substitution with Dany Nounkeu replacing Aurelien Chedjou.
In Manaus Croatia attack through Sammir. The finish is off target, however.
Cameroon have a goal kick.
In Manaus Cameroon drive forward through Eric Maxim Choupo Moting. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Goal! Croatia extend their lead to 0-2 through Ivan Perisic.
Pedro Proenca signals a Cameroon throw-in in Croatia's half.
Free kick Cameroon.

Danijel Pranjic with an assist there.

Pierre Webo (Cameroon) gets in a shot – but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Croatia's Eduardo has been booked in Manaus.
Pedro Proenca has blown to resume play in Manaus.
Edgar Salli is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Pedro Proenca will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the second half.
Cameroon's Edgar Salli is back in action after a slight knock.
Ball safe as Cameroon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pedro Proenca signals a Cameroon throw-in in Croatia's half.
Cameroon are coming forward and Dany Nounkeu gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.

The match is over. Final score 0-4.
